# chaCon.nvim

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/63523896/404554581-6bbd445c-5e70-4817-bca4-ab5bcbcbc793.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..8W0Db9bjQOTPgaoFeyMqtdhPy6DIhFMUwAu06JtR_c0)

## Plugins:

**Base:**
- [nvim-treesitter](https://github.com/nvim-treesitter/nvim-treesitter) 

**LSP:**
- [nvim-lspconfig](https://github.com/neovim/nvim-lspconfig)
- [mason](https://github.com/williamboman/mason.nvim)
- [mason-lspconfig](https://github.com/williamboman/mason-lspconfig.nvim)
- [mason-tool-installer](https://github.com/WhoIsSethDaniel/mason-tool-installer.nvim)
- [nvim-cmp](https://github.com/hrsh7th/nvim-cmp)

**Text Eedition:**
- [Comment.nvim](https://github.com/numToStr/Comment.nvim)
<!-- - [mini.nvim](https://github.com/echasnovski/mini.nvim) -->
- [obsidian.nvim](https://github.com/epwalsh/obsidian.nvim)
- [treesj](https://github.com/Wansmer/treesj)

**File Managment:**
- [harpoon](https://github.com/ThePrimeagen/harpoon)
- [neo-tree.nvim](https://github.com/nvim-neo-tree/neo-tree.nvim)
- [oil.nvim](https://github.com/stevearc/oil.nvim)
- [undotree](https://github.com/jiaoshijie/undotree)

**Git:**
- [gitsigns.nvim](https://github.com/lewis6991/gitsigns.nvim)

**Navegation:**
- [telescope.nvim](https://github.com/nvim-telescope/telescope.nvim)
- [trouble.nvim](https://github.com/folke/trouble.nvim)

**Formating:**
- [conform.nvim](https://github.com/stevearc/conform.nvim)

**UI:**
- [dropbar.nvim](https://github.com/Bekaboo/dropbar.nvim)
- [lualine.nvim](https://github.com/nvim-lualine/lualine.nvim)
- [which-key.nvim](https://github.com/folke/which-key.nvim)
- [todo-comments.nvim](https://github.com/folke/todo-comments.nvim)
- [alpha-nvim](https://github.com/goolord/alpha-nvim)
- [nightfox.nvim](https://github.com/EdenEast/nightfox.nvim)

**Lenguages:**
- Python:
    - [venv-selector](https://github.com/linux-cultist/venv-selector.nvim)

**Extra:**
- [vim-startuptime](https://github.com/dstein64/vim-startuptime)
